spell_tooltip.description: Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for 15 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by 40%. Lasts 13.2 sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Disintegrate channels 20% faster and Eruption's cast time is reduced by 20%.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by 2 min.
Fly to an ally and heal them for 643,451, or heal yourself for the same amount.
Essence regenerates 5% faster.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
Store 20% of your effective healing, up to 229,662. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 4 sec.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for 359,183 upon removing any effect.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by 40%.
Your Magic damage done is increased by 4%.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Magic damage taken reduced by 8%.
Your Stamina is increased by 6%.
Hover lasts 4 sec longer.
The flames of life surround you for 8.8 sec. While this effect is active, 100% of damage you take is healed back over 8 sec.
Emerald Blossom and Verdant Embrace instantly heal you for 160,349 when cast.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by 50% in the next 10 sec.
Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location. Clears movement impairing effects from you and your ally.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for 1.1 hour. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore 0.25% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit 1.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike 1 additional target per empower level.
Hover gains 1 additional charge.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to 30% of your maximum health for 5.5 sec.
Source of Magic increases the target's healing and damage done by 3%.
Breath of Eons stuns enemies for 3 sec.

Evoke a paradox for you and a friendly healer, allowing casting while moving and increasing the range of most spells by 100% for 11.0 sec.

Affects the nearest healer within 60 yds, if you do not have a healer targeted.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your 4 nearest allies within 20 yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by 20% and increasing movement speed by 30% for 8.8 sec.

Increase your 4 nearest allies' primary stat by 5.0% of your own, and cause you to deal 22% more damage, for 11.0 sec.

May only affect 4 allies at once, and does not affect tanks and healers.

Eruption, Breath of Eons, and your empower spells extend the duration of these effects.

Cause a violent eruption beneath an enemy's feet, dealing 512,810 Volcanic damage split between them and nearby enemies.

Increases the duration of your active Ebon Might effects by 1 sec.
Your Living Flame has a 20% chance, and your Azure Strike has a 15% chance, to make your next Eruption cost no Essence. Stacks 2 times.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by 20 sec.
Eruption deals 30% more damage per enemy struck, up to 150%.
Essence Burst stacks 2 times.
When cast at an enemy, Living Flame strikes 1 additional enemy for 100% damage.

Gather earthen power beneath your enemy's feet and send them hurtling upwards, dealing 774,491 Volcanic damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Increases the duration of your active Ebon Might effects by 2 sec.

Empowering expands the area of effect.

I:   3 yd radius.

II:  6 yd radius.

III: 9 yd radius.

Fly to the targeted location, exposing Temporal Wounds on enemies in your path for 11.0 sec.

Temporal Wounds accumulate 11% of damage dealt by your allies affected by Ebon Might, then critically strike for that amount as Arcane damage.

Applies Ebon Might for 5 sec.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.

Fatal attacks are diverted into a nearby timeline, preventing the damage, and your death, in this one.

The release of temporal energy restores 1.4 million health to you, and 506,864 to 4 nearby allies, over 9 sec. Healing starts high and declines over the duration.

May only occur once every 6 min.
Upheaval reaches maximum empower level 20% faster and has a 60% chance to grant Essence Burst.
Eruption's Essence cost is reduced by 1.
When allies deal damage with Temporal Wounds, they gain a shield for 100% of the damage dealt. Absorption cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.
While flying during Breath of Eons, 50% of damage you would take is instead dealt over 10 sec.

Protect an ally with 20 explosive dragonscales, increasing their Armor by 20% of your own.

Melee attacks against the target cause 1 scale to explode, dealing 32,018 Volcanic damage to enemies near them. This damage can only occur every few sec.

Blistering Scales can only be placed on one target at a time. Casts on your enemy's target if they have one.

Grant an ally the gift of foresight, increasing their critical strike chance by 3% and occasionally copying their damage and healing spells at 15% power for 19.9 sec.

Affects the nearest ally within 25 yds, preferring damage dealers, if you do not have an ally targeted.
Upheaval deals 50% increased damage to the primary target, and launches them higher.
Blistering Scales has 5 more scales, and casting Eruption restores 1 scale.
Consuming Essence Burst grants you 5% Intellect for 6.6 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Prescience grants the ally a chance for their spells and abilities to echo their damage or healing, dealing 15% of the amount again.
Essence Burst has a 20% chance to not be consumed.
Essence Burst reduces the cast time of Eruption by 40%.
Prescience has a 35% chance to grant Essence Burst.
Eruption reduces the remaining cooldown of Upheaval by 1.0 sec.
Breath of Eons reduces the Essence cost of Eruption by 1 and increases its damage by 10% for 15 sec after you land.
Surge forward in time, causing your cooldowns to recover 1,000% faster for 2 sec.
Fire Breath grants the inferno's blessing for 8.8 sec to you and your allies affected by Ebon Might, giving their damaging attacks and spells a high chance to deal an additional 93,921 Fire damage.
Upheaval causes an aftershock at its location, dealing 30% of its damage 2 additional times.
Breath of Eons grants you Fury of the Aspects for 15 sec after you land, without causing Exhaustion.
Fire Breath causes enemies to take up to 40% increased damage from your Black spells, increased based on its empower level.
Empower spells cause your next Eruption to strike up to 3 targets. When striking less than 3 targets, Eruption damage is increased by 15% for each missing target.
Black spells deal 20% increased damage.

Mass Eruption marks your primary target for destruction for the next 6 sec.

You and your allies have a chance to trigger a Bombardment when attacking marked targets, dealing 405,569 Volcanic damage split amongst all nearby enemies.
Entering combat grants a charge of Burnout, causing your next Living Flame to cast instantly.
Breath of Eons causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from Bombardments and Essence abilities for 12 sec.
Bombardments reduce the cooldown of Breath of Eons by 1 sec for each target struck, up to 3 sec.
For each second you are in combat, Azure Strike, Living Flame, and Eruption deal 1% increased damage, up to 15%.
Obsidian Scales reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Essence abilities extend Bombardments by 1 sec.
Deep Breath resets the cooldown of Hover.

Breath of Eons can now be steered in your desired direction.

In addition, Breath of Eons burns targets for 1.1 million Volcanic damage over 12 sec.
